message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $115, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $112.50 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last offer. How about we meet at $118?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $118 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $117, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable with $117. I'm willing to pay $114 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $116. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $116. I'm willing to pay $113 for it. This is my final offer.
